CustomField.formula: IF(RTL_Product_Group__c = "Loan" && (BEGINS(UPPER(RTL_Product_SubGroup__c), "SECURED") || BEGINS(UPPER(RTL_Product_SubGroup__c), "HOME")), "Secured Loan", IF((RTL_Product_Group__c = "Loan" && (BEGINS(UPPER(RTL_Product_SubGroup__c), "SECURED") = FALSE || BEGINS(UPPER(RTL_Product_SubGroup__c), "HOME") = FALSE)), "Unsecured Loan", RTL_Product_Group__c))
CustomField.label: CXM Product Group
